natural_language_plan: • First, pick up block b from the table. • Stack block b onto block c to position b on c. • Then, pick up block a from the table. • Finally, stack block a onto block b, achieving the goal state.

reasoning_steps: - Preconditions satisfied: clear b, ontable b, handempty
- Effects: holding b, not clear b, not ontable b, not handempty
- Preconditions satisfied: clear c, holding b
- Effects: on b c, clear b, not clear c, not holding b, handempty
- Preconditions satisfied: clear a, ontable a, handempty
- Effects: holding a, not clear a, not ontable a, not handempty
- Preconditions satisfied: clear b, holding a
- Effects: on a b, clear a, not clear b, not holding a, handempty
rationale: • First, pick up block b from the table.
• Stack block b onto block c to position b on c.
• Then, pick up block a from the table.
• Finally, stack block a onto block b, achieving the goal state.
